DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Severe Renal Disease or Disorder Present Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to presence of an intensely or extremely bad in degree of disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time involving kidneys.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Severe Renal Disease or Disorder Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to presence of an intensely or extremely bad in degree of disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time involving kidneys.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chronic Severe Renal Disease or Disorder
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:Intensely or extremely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality, or extent; life threatening.:Of or pertaining to the kidney.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: Usually used to describe a condition that is persistent and long standing.
Intensely bad or unpleasant in degree, quality or extent.
Of or pertaining to the kidney.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).
